title: Sound On: Vaccines in Trump Country, Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: Vaccines in Trump Country, Infrastructure
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Bloomberg White House reporter Josh Wingrove and Larry Krauck, Deputy White House National Climate Advisor Ali Zaidi, Republican nominee for New York City Mayor, Curtis Sliwa, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
